=Hi {{ $('Split Out').item.json['First Name'] }},

parameters.name: message

=Hi {{ $('Split Out').item.json['First Name'] }},

Please ensure payments are made on or before {{ $('Split Out').item.json['Payment Due Date'] }} to avoid penalties. If you have inquiries, please contact Denden on 09074824893.

parameters.name: message
parameters.value:
